DOC.brief_summary: This study determine compare plasma , epithelial lining fluid ( ELF ) alveolar macrophage ( AM ) concentration levonadifloxacin administration WCK 2349 healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Compare Plasma Intrapulmonary Pharmacokinetics WCK 2349 Healthy Adult Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male female , 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) time screen . Medical history without major pathology judge Principal Investigator . History presence significant oncologic , cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , hematological , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurological , psychiatric disease . Positive urine drug/alcohol test screen confinement . Positive test HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C. History presence alcohol drug abuse within 2 year prior screen . Excessive intake alcohol , defined average daily intake great three unit , average weekly intake great 21 unit ( one unit equivalent 1 bottle ( 12 oz ) beer , 1 measure ( 1.5 oz ) spirit , 1 glass ( 5 oz ) wine ) last 6 month prior screen . Known hypersensitivity quinolones/fluoroquinolones . History allergic serious adverse reaction benzodiazepine lidocaine .
